name: kuchen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of sweet cake, originally from Germany, that is often eaten with coffee: The German bakery was renowned for its kuchen and its Bavarian chocolate cake. My neighbours invited me over on Sunday morning for coffee and kuchen.
More examplesFewer examplesThe booths at the state fair sold local treats like kuchen and chocolate-covered potato chips.Having grown up in North Dakota, she had a fond memory of her grandmother's kuchen and tried her best to replicate the recipe for her friends.
